report.name: rapsynt

dataSource.name: Q_rapsynt
dataSource.select: SELECT d.datdebex, b.libbr, d.LIBDIR , si.sigdep, si.sigdep||'/'||si.sigpole sigpole, si.filcode, 'CA:'||si.centractiv centractiv, lf.ldeppole ldeppole1, lf.lcodcompta||' ' lcodcompta, lf.ident, lf.lmoisprest, DECODE(lf.typfact,'A',-lf.lmontht,lf.lmontht) CONSOM, lf.lnum, lf.SOCFACT, lf.numfact, lf.typfact, lf.datfact , r.rtype, sr.soccode, sr.cout, sr.prestation, sr.niveau FROM ligne_fact lf, datdebex d, struct_info si, directions d, branches b,ressource r,situ_ress_full sr WHERE lf.lmoisprest < d.datdebex AND (lf.socfact, lf.numfact, lf.typfact ,lf.datfact) IN ( SELECT socfact, numfact, typfact ,datfact FROM facture WHERE (FMODREGLT<>8 OR FMODREGLT is NULL) &P_WHERE AND FDATSAI >= d.datdebex AND TO_CHAR(FDATSAI,'dd/mm/yyyy') <= TO_DATE(:P_PARAM6,'dd/mm/yyyy') ) AND si.codsg=lf.ldeppole AND d.coddir=si.coddir AND b.codbr=d.codbr AND r.ident=lf.ident AND sr.ident=lf.ident AND (sr.datsitu <= lf.lmoisprest or sr.datsitu is null) AND (sr.datdep >= lf.lmoisprest or sr.datdep is null) AND sr.prestation not in ('MO ','GRA');

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT d.datdebex, b.libbr, d.LIBDIR , si.sigdep, si.sigdep||'/'||si.sigpole sigpole, b.libbr||'/'||d.LIBDIR||'/'||si.sigdep lib_dep, si.filcode, 'CA:'||si.centractiv centractiv, lf.ldeppole ldeppole1, lf.lcodcompta||' ' lcodcompta, lf.ident, lf.lmoisprest, DECODE(lf.typfact,'A',-lf.lmontht,lf.lmontht) CONSOM, lf.lnum, lf.SOCFACT, lf.numfact, lf.typfact, lf.datfact FROM ligne_fact lf, datdebex d, struct_info si, directions d, branches b WHERE lf.lmoisprest < d.datdebex AND (lf.socfact, lf.numfact, lf.typfact ,lf.datfact) IN ( SELECT socfact, numfact, typfact ,datfact FROM facture WHERE (FMODREGLT<>8 OR FMODREGLT is NULL) &P_WHERE AND FDATSAI >= d.datdebex AND TO_CHAR(FDATSAI,'dd/mm/yyyy') <= TO_DATE(:P_PARAM6,'dd/mm/yyyy') ) AND si.codsg=lf.ldeppole -- correction le 06/03/2008 à la demande de gérard -- on inclut les DIR , ils onst affichés dans le détail , donc on ne les enlève pas des totaux --AND si.sigpole<>'DIR' AND d.coddir=si.coddir AND b.codbr=d.codbr;

textSegment.string: Factures reçues sur consommés des années antérieures

function.name: cf_nb_realiseformula
afterpform
cf_1formula
cf_coutformula
cf_1formula0005
cf_montant_mensformula
